summary.span: 將字串編碼以用於 HTML、XML、CSS 和 URL 字串中。

span.span: Encodes a string for use in HTML, XML, CSS, and URL strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用類別來覆寫類別，用來編碼和解碼類別方法中的字串，例如預設， ，和。You can use the class to override the class that is used by default to encode and decode strings in methods of classes such as , , and . 在 類別，安全清單中找不到的所有字元都會都編碼所和方法。In the class, all characters that are not found in the safe list are encoded by the and methods. 若要取代類別類別中，使用登錄它`encoderType`httpRuntime 項目，在 Web.config 檔案中，如下列範例所示的屬性：To replace the class with the class, register it using the `encoderType` attribute of the httpRuntime element in the Web.config file, as shown in following example: ``` ``` 如需不同的編碼方法的預設安全字元清單可以找到中的 < 備註 > ， ， ，和方法。A list of default safe characters for different encoding methods can be found in the remarks for the , , , and methods. 使用也可以修改預設的安全清單方法。The default safe list can be modified by using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將不安全的清單中的所有字元都編碼。This method encodes all characters except those that are in the safe list. > [!NOTE] > 加上引號 ("") 括住產生的字串之前將它新增至階層式樣式表。Put quotation marks (" ") around the resulting string before you add it to a cascading style sheet. 下表列出預設安全的字元。The following table lists the default safe characters. |Unicode 程式碼圖表Unicode code chart|字元Character(s)|描述Description| |------------------------|--------------------|-----------------| |[C0 控制項和基本拉丁文C0 Controls and Basic Latin](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)|A-ZA-Z|大寫的字母字元Uppercase alphabetic characters| |[C0 控制項和基本拉丁文C0 Controls and Basic Latin](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)|-za-z|小寫字母的字元Lowercase alphabetic characters| |[C0 控制項和基本拉丁文C0 Controls and Basic Latin](https://www.unicode.org/charts/PDF/U0000.pdf)|0-90-9|編號Numbers| 下表列出範例輸入，以及對應編碼的輸出。The following table lists examples of inputs and the corresponding encoded outputs. ||| |-|-| |`alert('XSS Attack!');`|`alert\000028\000027XSS\000020Attack\000021\000027\000029\00003B`| |`user@contoso.com`|`user\000040contoso\00002Ecom`| |`Anti-Cross Site Scripting Namespace`|`Anti\00002DCross\000020Site\000020Scripting\000020Namespace`| CSS 字元逸出序列所組成的反斜線字元 (\\) 後面最多六個十六進位數字，代表從 ISO 10646 標準的字元碼。The CSS character escape sequence consists of a backslash character (\\) followed by up to six hexadecimal digits that represent a character code from the ISO 10646 standard. （會有效等同於 Unicode 標準 ISO 10646）。十六進位數字以外的任何字元是逸出序列的結尾。(The ISO 10646 standard is effectively equivalent to Unicode.) Any character other than a hexadecimal digit terminates the escape sequence. 如果遵循逸出序列的字元也是有效的十六進位數字，它必須逸出序列中包含六個位數，或使用空格字元來終止逸出序列。If a character that follows the escape sequence is also a valid hexadecimal digit, it must either include six digits in the escape sequence or use a white-space character to terminate the escape sequence. 比方說，`\000020`代表空間。For example, `\000020` denotes a space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 安全清單會影響所有 HTML XML、 CSS 和 URL 編碼的方法。The safe list affects all HTML XML, CSS, and URL encoding methods. 但有些例外狀況，Unicode 字碼圖表未直接對應到書寫語言。With some exceptions, Unicode code charts do not directly correspond to written languages. 若要新增支援特定語言或語言組通常需要將多個程式碼圖表標示為安全。To add support for a specific language or set of languages often requires marking multiple code charts as safe. 若要新增日文語言的支援，同時允許英文繼續，請使用下列語法：To add support for the Japanese language while continuing to allow English, use the following syntax: ``` MarkAsSafe( LowerCodeCharts.Default, LowerMidCodeCharts.HangulJamo, MidCodeCharts.None, UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkRadicalsSupplement | UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkSymbolsAndPunctuation | UpperMidCodeCharts.Hiragana | UpperMidCodeCharts.Katakana | UpperMidCodeCharts.KatakanaPhoneticExtensions | UpperMidCodeCharts.LatinExtendedD | UpperMidCodeCharts.CjkUnifiedIdeographs, UpperCodeCharts.None); ``` > [!NOTE] > 必須呼叫方法`Application_Start`Global.asax 檔案中的方法。The method must be called in the `Application_Start` method in the Global.asax file.

exception.span: 在 Global.asax 檔中，會在 方法外部呼叫 方法。

span.span: The method was called outside the method in the Global.asax file.

`file:`), the authority (for example, `www.northwind.com` or `www.contoso.com:8080`), or the query or fragment (for example, `?v=s978dfs9#x=103`). 如果沒有任何配置或字串中的授權單位，為相對路徑，會假設字串是，而且路徑會編碼。If there is no scheme or authority in the string, the string is assumed to be a relative path, and the path is encoded. 在下列 URL 中，子字串`/default.htm`編碼：In the following URL, only the substring `/default.htm` is encoded: `http://www.contoso.com:8080/default.htm?v=s978dfs9#x=103`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將不安全的清單中的所有字元都編碼。This method encodes all characters except those that are in the safe list. 字元都會編碼使用`&#DECIMAL;`標記法。Characters are encoded by using `&#DECIMAL;` notation. > [!NOTE] > 雙引號 ("") 或單一引號 (' ') 括住產生的字串之前將它新增至頁面。Put double quotation marks (" ") or single quotation marks (' ') around the resulting string before you add it to a page. 下表列出預設安全的字元。The
